def_cn: (尤指心脏病或脑部疾病的)突然发作，侵袭
def_en: If someone has a seizure, they have a sudden violent attack of an illness, especially one that affects their heart or brain.

def_cn: (对权力、土地的)夺取;(突然的)占领，控制
def_en: If there is a seizure of power or a seizure of an area of land, a group of people suddenly take control of the place, using force.

def_cn: (对非法物品的)起获，查封
def_en: When an organization such as the police or customs service makes a seizure of illegal goods, they find them and take them away.

def_cn: (因欠款未还而采取的)没收，充公
def_en: If a financial institution or a government makes a seizure of someone's assets, they take their money or property from them because they have not paid money that they owe.
